title: The Bear's Fake Bride
description: Wealthy WereBear Zeke Croasdell was in an incredibly urgent need of a wife.  His billionaire father was threatening to cut him off from the family inheritance if he did not find a mate soon.  So Zeke paid 23 year old Charlie Harrison to be his wife for long enough for him to claim the money.  However, Charlie had no idea what being with a billionaire werebear would be like.  And she was set to be in for the shock of her life when she found out...
author: Amy Star
